cui_name: Myeloid/Lymphoid Neoplasms with Eosinophilia and Rearrangement of PDGFRA, PDGFRB, or FGFR1, or with PCM1-JAK2
reasoning: Rare myeloid/lymphoid neoplasm with molecular rearrangements. Represents subset of myeloproliferative disorders with specific genetic aberrations (PDGFRA, PDGFRB, FGFR1, PCM1-JAK2). Estimated incidence <0.2 per 100k based on WHO classification and registry data from specialized hematologic centers.
source: WHO Classification of Myeloid Neoplasms and Acute Leukemias (2016/2022)
